data.title: About: Babble.com
data.meta_description: Babble was an online magazine and blog network targeting young, educated, urban parents. Their site operated a large network of parent blogs, employing many bloggers on the subjects of parenting and child-raising. In early 2019, it was announced that Babble had been shut down.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Babble was an online magazine and blog network targeting young, educated, urban parents. Their site operated a large network of parent blogs, employing many bloggers on the subjects of parenting and child-raising. In early 2019, it was announced that Babble had been shut down. (en)

Babble est un magazine en ligne et un réseau de blogs à destination des jeunes parents instruits et urbains. Le site regroupe un large réseau de blogs de parents employés sur les sujets de la parentalité et l'éducation des enfants. Fondé en décembre 2006, il faisait partie du Disney Digital Network avant sa fermeture en décembre 2018. (fr)

rdfs:comment
